IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.modify_guild_introduction') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.modify_guild_introduction GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.modify_guild_introduction @guild_id dbo.id_t, @introduction NVARCHAR(254) AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE Guilds SET introduction = @introduction WHERE id = @guild_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
